  5. Windows Setup

    Apps Office365 macOS去App Store搜：office365，进行下载安装即可 windows 10、windows11 office365官网下载地址： 下载链接： https://officecdn.microsoft.com/db/492350F6-3A01-4F97-B9C0-C7C6DDF67D60/media/zh-cn/O365ProPlusRetail.img

  6. macOS Setup

    System Preferences Dock 在 System Preference > Dock & Menu Bar 里，把 Show recent applications in Dock 前面的勾去掉。 defaults write com.apple.dock persistent-apps -array; killall Dock

    2022/08/05 Tool

  7. IntelliJ IDEA Setup

    Preferences fonts Appearance & Behavior - Appearance - Use custom font LXGW Wenkai Mono 16

    2022/08/05 Tool

  8. Ubuntu Setup

    zsh oh-my-zsh ```sh install zsh echo $SHELL cat /etc/shells apt update && apt install zsh -y chsh -s /bin/zsh reboot
